name: Fifty-One Revengeance Part IV: The escapening
name_original: Fifty-One Revengeance Part IV: The escapening
description:
A Game jam project under the theme of "Escape".

The game premise is that you're escaping Area 51 with a load of memes the US govt. was keeping secret.

We decided to just make the goofiest experience possible and fill it with memes for a laugh. It's a joke. Please do NOT take it seriously.
